item.title: Intigriti's monthly challenge - May 2022
item.description: This content is password protected for the time being. Javascript needs to be enabled to decrypt content The challenge First contact While browsing the website, one can notice the ?page=x query parameter having different integer values in the URI. A quick glance at the website source code then leads to a particular <script> tag handling it: var pages = { 1: 'HOME [∝< SOME HTML CODE >∝]', 2: 'PRODUCTS [∝< SOME HTML CODE >∝]', 3: 'CONTACT [∝< SOME HTML CODE >∝]', 4: '[∝< SOME HTML CODE >∝]', }; var pl = $.
